thread.title: Katy

author: Katy
title: Katy
text: Brilliant service! Booked by RAC mechanic online, received confirmation e-mail within an hour and a call to confirm order. On the day, received an e-mail with a time slot. The mechanic arrived 2 hours before allotted time (left a message beforehand), took less than 10 minutes to fit a tyre and checked all the other tyres. Fair price and hassle-free service. Will use again, thank you!
